attributes.action: Allow people to continue using FRESH MILK and not make eveyone use UHT.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The proposal to make everyone use UHT milk is another example of BIG BROTHER trying to run peoples lives for them. UHT milk is awful stuff. If I can't buy fresh I won't by any.

reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
